name: Super Mario on Scratch 2 Remastered - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch 2 Remastered - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch 2 Remastered that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/416787092/

Credits -

Nintendo for Mario and most of the sounds/music. 

Me for most of the art.

Mario text style by Olivermario12 on Scratch

Scrolling engine by griffpatch on Scratch

Intro by 27jdbloom on Scratch

Mobile joystick by MaxyBrian on Scratch

Special Thanks to -

_meow_gobo_ on Scratch

b1048546 on Scratch

Bunnynightfan on Scratch

-MrRock- on Scratch

triangle5820 on Scratch
